globetrotter-introduction.earn-travel-mo: Earn travel money and unlock clues by playing!
globetrotter-introduction.stage-globe-sp: Hi! I am GEO, your guide. Let's race around the world!
Your mission is to travel around the world in as few days as possible. To travel you need money. Earn your money by guessing where you are!
globetrotter-introduction.stage-passport: Each city visit gives you a stamp in your passport!
globetrotter-introduction.stage-coins-sp: Here's some travel money to get you going!
